basicContact.title: Basic contact
basicContact.description: How we reach you and where you are based.

emergencyContact.title: Emergency contact
emergencyContact.description: Who we should contact in case of an emergency.

demographics.title: Demographics
demographics.description: Optional identity details to personalize your experience.

physical.title: Physical attributes
physical.description: Sizing and measurements for events and gear.

medical.title: Medical information
medical.description: Optional health details to keep you safe.

hints.locationDisplay: Shown on your profile. Example: Mexico City, MX.
hints.heightCm: Optional; helps with sizing and categories.
hints.medicalConditions: Optional. Only share what race directors should know for your safety.

gender.helper: Choose the option that fits best. You can skip or self-describe.
gender.selfDescribeLabel: How do you describe your gender?
gender.selfDescribeHint: Optional. Share this only if you want to self-describe.

description.default: Update the name shown on your account.
description.admin: Update the name associated with your admin account.

errors.save: We couldn't update your name. Please try again.
errors.name: Enter a valid name.

description.default: Update your password to keep your account secure.
description.admin: Change the password for your admin account.

hints.password: Use 8–128 characters. Avoid common or compromised passwords.

errors.requirements: Use a password between 8 and 128 characters.
errors.pwned: This password appears in a breach. Choose another.
errors.invalidInput: Check the required fields and try again.
errors.changePassword: We couldn't change your password. Please try again.

accountDeleteSection.title: Delete account
accountDeleteSection.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.

dialog.title: Delete your account?
dialog.description: This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers.

warning.title: This action is irreversible
warning.description: Your profile, settings, and all associated data will be permanently deleted.

errors.unauthenticated: You must be signed in to delete your account.
errors.noPassword: You need to set a password before you can delete your account.
errors.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.

profilePicture.title: Profile picture
profilePicture.description: Upload a photo to personalize your profile.
profilePicture.hint: JPEG, PNG, WebP, or GIF. Max {maxSize}MB.

errors.invalidImage: Invalid image. Please try another file.
errors.deleteFailed: Could not delete the picture. Please try again.

deleteDialog.title: Delete profile picture?
deleteDialog.description: This will remove your profile picture. You can upload a new one anytime.

status.title: Current access
status.description: Review your Pro access, sources, and timelines.
status.internal: Internal accounts aren't eligible for Pro billing.

trial.title: Start your trial
trial.description: Each account is eligible for one Pro trial.
trial.requiresVerification: Verify your email to start a trial.
trial.alreadyUsed: This account has already used its trial.
trial.success: Trial started. Pro access ends on {endsAt}.

errors.emailNotVerified: Verify your email before starting a trial.
errors.alreadyUsed: This account has already used its trial.
errors.unauthenticated: Sign in to start a trial.
errors.generic: We couldn't start the trial. Please try again.

subscription.title: Subscription management
subscription.description: Cancel or resume your current period.

errors.notFound: No subscription found for this account.
errors.generic: We couldn't update the subscription. Please try again.

promo.title: Redeem a promo
promo.description: Enter a promo code to extend Pro access.

success.redeemed: Promo applied. Pro access extends to {endsAt}.
success.alreadyRedeemed: Promo code already redeemed for this account.
success.noExtension: Promo redeemed, but it does not extend your current access.

errors.unauthenticated: Sign in to redeem a promo.
errors.rateLimited: Too many attempts. Please wait and try again.
errors.inactive: Promo code is inactive or expired.
errors.maxRedemptions: This promo has reached its redemption limit.
errors.generic: We couldn't redeem that promo code.
